wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Mornin (1956-2014) was an Irish playwright, screenwriter and novelist writing about contemporary Ulster.

Nothing Personal is a 1995 Irish-British drama film; it was directed by Thaddeus O'Sullivan with screenwriter Daniel Mornin.
